title: What should one do to become a teacher? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi I don't Understand what you are asking I mean a teacher in what Field? By the way for becoming a teacher in any particular field you need to be knowledgeable in that field and more importantly you need better communication skill including confidence, congratulations and hats off to your great thinking because only rare people think of this extraordinary job. Go for it - best of luck

To become a teacher you should have a subject specific knowledge which can be expressed in it’s simplest form. But to become a govenment teacher in India you should have certain qualifications. For example to become a 3rd grade teacher who teaches at primary level you should have a B.ed. degree which can be obtained after graduation or you should have STC which can be done after 12th class. To become a 2nd grade teacher who teaches at upper primary level and secondary level you need to be a B.ed. graduate. To become a 1st grade teacher who teaches at senior secondary level you should have masters degree in a subject with B.Ed.
